alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:31PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chicot and northwestern Washington Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamont, or 9 miles northwest of Greenville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Winterville around 340 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 355 PM CDT. Leland around 410 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
